hero.h1: Connect through sport with peers at your level
hero.subhead: Invite-only workouts for founders, operators, and VCs in London and New York. Small groups. Clear talk. Strong ties that last.
hero.emotionalLine: You push hard. You carry real weight. You want people from your high-quality ecosystem who can keep up and care. We help you find them and know them on sight.
hero.proof: Invite only. Verified roles. No spam.

who.title: Who we serve
who.body: You run a company, a fund, or both. Your time is tight. You train most weeks. You want peers from your circle who value effort, truth, and clear plans. You prefer small rooms where good talk happens fast.
bullets: VC-backed founders from pre-seed to growth
Senior operators who own hard problems
VCs, angels, and fund partners who stay active

problem.title: The problem
problem.body: You meet many people. Few match your pace, your hours, or your drive. Big rooms drain energy. Calendars get in the way. A strong first chat fades when plans slip and life gets loud.

promise.title: The promise
promise.body: Meet the right two people this week from your high-quality ecosystem. Train together. Share what matters. Leave with a next step. We plan the slot and the place, then help you keep the tie alive.

items.headline: Connection first
items.copy: We bring peers from your high-quality circle. Sport is the way in, not the end.

items.headline: Tiny groups, real talk
items.copy: 1:1 and triads keep things simple and honest. The right size for trust.

items.headline: Made for your day
items.copy: We match level, time windows, and travel radius. You meet close by and on time.

items.headline: A concierge handles the plan
items.copy: It reads your calendar, proposes slots, books, and rebooks when life moves.

items.headline: Invite-only and quiet
items.copy: Verified roles. Clear norms. No pitches. No noise.

how.title: How it works
how.lead: Simple steps. Little friction. Strong follow-through.
steps: Set sport, pace, and time windows
Keep the tie alive with quick nudges
how.note: Works with Google or Apple Calendar. Reads Strava on request to set pace bands.

items.name: Curation
items.body: Invite-only with real-name checks and trusted refs. We keep a high bar so your time stays clean.

items.name: Matching
items.body: Person fit first, then sport and level. Time, area, company stage, and talk topics round it out. You see why a match fits in plain words.

items.name: Rituals
items.body: Fixed slots and partner venues. The plan exists each week, so meets happen by default.

items.name: Memory
items.body: A light place for notes, last met, and the next touch. You remember what matters and when to meet again.

items.name: Concierge
items.body: A smart helper that plans, books, reminds, and rebooks. It keeps the meet safe from calendar chaos.

matching.title: Matching that builds the right ties
matching.body: We start with people and fit. Role, stage, and talk topics set the tone. Then we confirm sport and level so the session flows. We lock time windows that fit your week. We map a short travel radius near home or office. We favor triads so if one person drops, a strong 1:1 still runs.
matching.note: You can pass on a match with one tap. Passes teach the system what you like.

rituals.title: Rituals that stick
rituals.body: Set days and venue blocks mean you do not plan from scratch. A host opens the session. You warm up, work, cool down, then take ten minutes for a short chat that lands a next step.

list: Sat 8:00 Long run in Richmond Park or ride to Box Hill

rituals.note: We book venue blocks. You can request other slots.

signals.title: Quiet signals
signals.intro: Members can spot each other at tracks, gyms, and coffee lines. Signals stay discreet and opt-in.

items.name: Glyph
items.body: A small mark on a cap or tee. No big logo. Subtle and clean.

items.name: Band
items.body: A slim wrist band with a city color and tiny pace dots. Easy to wear. Easy to hide.

items.name: Lace tag
items.body: A small tag on a shoe lace. Metal or nylon. Stays quiet and lasts.

items.name: Wallet pass
items.body: An Apple Wallet pass for check-in and a quick flash when you meet a peer.

items.name: Phrase
items.body: A simple hello that members know. "Morning pace?" works anywhere.

items.name: Venue tile
items.body: A small desk tile at partner gyms to mark the meet point.

signals.note: You can turn signals on or off anytime.

kit.title: Member kit
kit.body: New members can order a small starter kit. It ships with discreet gear you can wear on any day. No loud brand. Durable pieces only.
list: Lace tag with NFC for check-in and referrals
Slim wrist band with city color
Sticker pack for phone or bottle

trust.title: Trust and rules
trust.intro: This is a quiet space for people who value time and respect. Simple norms keep meets strong.
bullets: Invite only. Each member can sponsor one person per month
Proof of role with LinkedIn or an investor ref
No pitching. On time. No photos without consent
Public venues and partner gyms. Live location toggle
Small deposit per meet. No-shows lose the deposit. On-time shows earn credits
Private by default. You control contact share and recognition mode

cities.title: Cities and plans
cities.intro: Start in your city. Swap to the other city when you travel.
cities.microcopy: Pricing covers the service and set venue blocks. Extras stay at cost.

funds.title: For funds
funds.body: Give your founders a steady way to meet real peers. We run private blocks near your office in London and New York. GPs, partners, and portfolio leads train together, talk straight, and form ties that move across companies. We can add a small fund mark on gear for private groups.

finalCta.body: Apply now. We review new members each week. We keep a high bar so the room stays right.
